example1.title: {{0}}Isibonelo sekhodi yekhasi lasekhaya
example1.annotation1: Nquma ukuthi igama lesizinda elifanayo eliyinhloko yini uma kungenjalo, buyisela okuthi {{0}} futhi ungabe usasayinda.
example1.annotation3: Nquma ukuthi ngabe kuyikhasi levidiyo yini indlela yalo iqala ngokuthi /ukubuka uma kunjalo, {{0}} izobuyiswa.
example1.annotation4: Nquma ukuthi ingabe kuyikhasi levidiyo elifushane yini indlela yalo iqala ngokuthi /okufushane/ Uma kunjalo, {{0}} izobuyiswa.
